markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enlarged Chassis](/Feats.aspx?ID=3108) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Automaton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=398" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 43</row>

**Prerequisites**
Medium or Small size

</column>

---

You've empowered your core to support a larger body, granting you size and additional reach. You gain the effects of [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) constantly.

**Enhancement** Your core's empowerment has stabilized, allowing for greater support. You are no longer clumsy due to the effects of _enlarge_.
name: Enlarged Chassis
